tool.name: Abundance in environment
tool.description: Show the abundance according to the location

param.name: individual
param.label: The abundance of what are you computing ?
param.help: This parameter allows you to write in the title of the graph the abundance of which specie or community, that you want to compute.

tool.help:
================== Maps the abundance ==================
**What it does** This tool computes the abundances of species according to there locations data:
- Maps the abundance
**Input description** A tabular file with observation data. Must at least contain three columns which associate abundance, latitude and longitude or 'abundance', 'latitude' and 'longitude' with species ID.
+----------+-----------+--------------+------------+ | latitude | longitude | species.code | number | +==========+===========+==============+============+ | lat |long | speciesID | 4 | +----------+-----------+--------------+------------+ | ... | ... | ... | ... | +----------+-----------+--------------+------------+
**Output** A png file with every abundance dots for each location such as the image following
.. image::envi_abond.png
